body.p:
The Check Spelling in Files action allows you to check the spelling on multiple local or remote documents. This action is available in the following locations:
The Edit menu.
The contextual menu of the ProjectProject Explorer view.
The contextual menu of the DITA Maps Manager view, when editing DITA documents. This action opens the Check Spelling in Files dialog box that allows you to define the scope and several other options. After you configure the settings for the operation, click the Check All button to check the spelling in all specified files.

fig.title: Check Spelling in Files Dialog Box (Invoked from Project View)

body.p: The following scopes are possible, depending on where the action was invoked:

ul.li: All opened files - The spell check is performed in all open files.
Current file directory - All the files in the folder of the currently edited file.

body.p: The Options section includes the following options:

ul.li: File filter - Allows you to filter the files from the selected scope.
